## NBCLUST optimizacion de nÃºmero de grupos

```{r echo=FALSE, messages = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
set.seed(311265)
rvl <- select(rvl, RVL1:RVL5)
rvl$RVLTOT <- rowSums(rvl)
rvl <- rvl %>%  mutate(GRP=case_when(RVLTOT <= median(rvl$RVLTOT) ~ 1, RVLTOT > median(rvl$RVLTOT) ~ 2))
cluster.optim <- NbClust(data = rvl[,1:5],diss = NULL,distance = "euclidean",min.nc = 2,max.nc = 10,method = "ward.D2",index = 'all')
print(cluster.optim)
rvl <- cbind(rvl, grpclus=cluster.optim$`Best.partition`)
```

## Cluster por algoritmo Kmeans

```{r echo=FALSE, messages = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#******************************************
#kMeans
#******************************************
fviz_nbclust(rvl[,1:5], kmeans, method = "silhouette")
km.res <- kmeans(rvl[,1:5], 2, nstart = 50)
rvl <- cbind(rvl, cluster.km = km.res$cluster)
fviz_cluster(
  km.res,
  data = rvl[,1:5],
  palette = c("darksalmon", "paleturquoise", "cadetblue", "#FC4E07", "#b2b2b2"),
  ellipse.type = "t",
  # Concentration ellipse
  star.plot = FALSE,
  # Add segments from centroids to items
  repel = TRUE,
  # Avoid label overplotting (slow)
  max.overlaps = 300,
  pointsize = 1,
  ggtheme = theme_minimal()
)
```

## PAM Method

```{r echo=FALSE}
#******************************************
#PAM
#******************************************
fviz_nbclust(rvl[,1:5], pam, method = "silhouette")
set.seed(311265)
pam.res <- pam(rvl[,1:5], 2)
rvl <- cbind(rvl, cluster.pam = pam.res$cluster)
fviz_cluster(
        pam.res,
        palette = c("darksalmon", "blue"),
        # color palette
        ellipse.type = "t",
        # Concentration ellipse
        star.plot = FALSE,
        # Add segments from centroids to items
        repel = TRUE,
        # Avoid label overplotting (slow)
        max.overlaps = 300,
        pointsize = 1,
        ggtheme = theme_classic()
)
```


## CLARA Method

```{r echo=FALSE}
#******************************************
#CLARA
#******************************************
fviz_nbclust(rvl[,1:5], clara, method = "silhouette")
set.seed(311265)
clara.res <- clara(rvl[,1:5],2,metric = "euclidean",stand = FALSE,samples = 5,pamLike = FALSE)
rvl <- cbind(rvl, cluster.clr = clara.res$cluster)
fviz_cluster(
        clara.res,
        palette = c("darksalmon", "blue"),
        # color palette
        ellipse.type = "t",
        geom = "point",
        star.plot = FALSE,
        # Add segments from centroids to items
        repel = FALSE,
        # Avoid label overplotting (slow)
        max.overlaps = 300,
        pointsize = 1,
        ggtheme = theme_classic()
)
kable(head(rvl,10)) %>% 
  kable_material(c('striped'))
```
